column1: Little Goat Diner////I love this diner! The food was so tasty
column2: the atmosphere was hip and chic
column3: and if you want to skip the wait
column4: you can choose bar seating. It was quite crowded the weekend I decided to go
column5: and even though I made a reservation
column6: I was still given bar seating. I ordered the chicken and waffles dish and it is easily one of the best restaurants to serve the pairing. You wont regret it!
